abstract: A panel found that Halliburton supplied BP with unstable cement, which may have contributed to Gulf blowout.
snippet: A panel found that Halliburton supplied BP with unstable cement, which may have contributed to Gulf blowout.
lead_paragraph: Halliburton is back in the spotlight, and once again, in an uncomfortable way.

headline.main: Inquiry Puts Halliburton in a Familiar Hot Seat
headline.print_headline:
Spill Inquiry Again Puts
Halliburton Into Spotlight

byline.original: By Barry Meier and Clifford Krauss
